item.title: ফাইল ম্যানিপুলেশন
item.description: Condition if day == "sunday" || day == "saturday" { rest() } else if day == "monday" && isTired() { groan() } else { work() } if _, err := doThing(); err != nil { fmt.Println("Uh oh")
